name: Airship Janitor Rampage
description:
You are a robot janitor.

Someone stole your golden buckets and scattered them all over the airships you just cleaned. They've also committed the most horrendous crime of littering.

You must collect (good) buckets and avoid (bad) buckets to get as far as you can before you rust.

Controls

Left / Right Arrows - Change Lanes

Up or Space - Jump

Down - Use mop to destroy obstacles

Tips
  • Head up the stairs at the end of each airship and jump to move to the next ship.
  • Watch your rust level! If the bar on the right fills up, it's game over. Collecting buckets will increase your score and lower your rust.
  • You can press down to destroy all nearby obstacles. The reload time for this is displayed at the bottom of the screen.
  • Collecting Coloured buckets will give you various effects:
    • Poopy black buckets will obscure your vision lenses
    • Slippery blue buckets will send you careening at high speeds
    • Gooey purple buckets will slow you down

Made by FridgeRaiders and Rhys Kemmis
